review_title: Middle Georgia College Good Place to Work
pros:
1. Decent hours
2. Good Pay
3. Conditions are decent for the job that I am doing
4. Bosses are good to get along with
cons:
1. Not enough opportunity for advancement
2. Although pay and hours are good, there is not much of a chance for overtime

pros: It is a job that pays a good salary in a tough economy. It is a good way to get some experience in a really bad school before moving up to a better one. It's merging with Macon State - maybe things will change for the better after the merger.
cons: Hard work is punished by both the students and administration. Cheating is so common that it's difficult to catch everybody without failing nearly all of the students. When you fail a significant percentage of your students, they gant up on you and file false complaints against you, or start screaming and otherwise disrupting the class.

pros: The week is set up as Tuesday/Thursday and Monday/Wednesday instead of Monday/Wednesday/Friday. Fridays was designated for meetings and extra office hours.
cons: After four years there I was making the same salary. No raises, no promotions.
